p: Three pure lyophilized Gram-negative bacteria of Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853), Salmonella typhimurium (ATCC 13311), and Escherichia coli (ATCC 8739); three Gram-positive bacteria of Enterococcus faecalis (ATCC 29212), Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 12711), and Staphylococcus aurous (ATCC 25923), and also two fungi Candida albicans (ATCC 10231), and Aspergillus niger (ATCC 9142) were purchased from the “Iranian Research Organization for Science and Technology” (a member of the WFCC). Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aurous (MRSA) was a hospital-resistant sample and was devotedly provided by Professor Moghimi. Our department confirmed the purity and character.
